common.looking_for_gloves: Looking for a new pair of gloves for sparring or bag work? We've got you covered with over 40 pairs to choose from.
common.train_in_boots: Train in style with the latest innovations in Boxing Shoes from Nike, Adidas and Venum. Time to lace up!
common.elite_heavy_bags: Elite heavy punching bags of all shapes and sizes, including the unrivalled Aqua Training Bag. Used by pro fighters worldwide.
common.essential_boxing_protection: Essential boxing protective equipment to keep you covered during the toughest sessions. Wraps, Headgear, Mouthguards & more!
common.latest_rashguards: The latest rash guards and grappling shorts, fresh for no-gi season.
common.for_mats: For on and off the mats
common.welcome_to: Welcome to Fighters - the premiere online supplier of the latest Mixed Martial Arts, boxing and fitness equipment. We also offer an extensive range of uniforms and MMA apparel for training, competition and streetwear from the sports brands you trust. Whether you're a fan, fighter or practitioner, we're the first and last word when it comes to supplying you with all the specialized combat sports and martial arts equipment you need to perform your best. Shop our online store for the latest MMA clothing and martial arts training equipment, including: MMA Fight Shorts & MMA Gloves, Boxing Gloves, MMA & UFC T shirts, BJJ Gi's and Rashguards.
common.we_are_num_one: We're the number one choice for athletes when it comes to martial arts and combat sports, with the largest selection of gear and apparel for MMA, Muay Thai, Boxing, Kickboxing, Karate and Taekwondo. Shop for innovative workout equipment and clothing, including: grappling dummies, strength and conditioning gear, and all the uniforms, protective gear and training apparel you'll need to push yourself to the absolute limit. Choose from heavyweight brands from the likes of Venum, Ringside Boxing, Sandee, Fairtex and so many more.
